item.title: [PI] 317 Mithril seeds help?
item.dc:creator: @T7S T7S
item.description:
@T7S wrote:

I get this compiler error :

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:15: error: annotation type not a pplicable to this kind of declaration @Override ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

After messing around within that file, I found that the following code is causing the problem.

@Override

	public static int flower[] = {2980,2981,2982,2983,2984,2985,2986,2987};
        public int randomflower() {
                return flower[(int)(Math.random()*flower.length)];
        }
        public static int flowerX = 0;
        public static int flowerY = 0;
        public static int flowerTime = -1;
        public static int flowers = 0;

This is the link I’m using to add mithril seeds

Read full topic
